parameters.description: The 3-letter currency code defined in ISO 4217.

parameters.name: data.cost_limit.display_name
parameters.description: String representation of money entity.

parameters.name: data.cost_limit.nanos
parameters.description: Number of nano (10^-9) units of the amount. For example $-1.75 is represented as `units`=-1 and `nanos`=-750,000,000.

parameters.name: data.cost_limit.units
parameters.description: The whole units of the amount.

parameters.name: data.end.day
parameters.description: Day of month. Must be from 1 to 31 and valid for the year and month, or 0. if specifying a year by itself or a year and month where the day is not significant.

parameters.name: data.end.display_name
parameters.description: Localized String representation of date.

parameters.name: data.end.month
parameters.description: Month of year. Must be from 1 to 12, or 0 if specifying a year without a month and day.

parameters.name: data.end.year
parameters.description: Year of date. Must be from 1 to 9999, or 0 if specifying a date without a year.
